price: ߞߋ߲ߛߐ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߛߟߐߡߌ߲ ߦߋ߫ ߖߌ߰ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߋ ߟߋ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߊ߫ ߘߌ߬ߢߍ ߟߊ߫ ߞߏߢߊ ߓߍ߯ ߘߐ߫
arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: tanazzalu al-malāikatu wal-rūḥu fīhā bi-idh'ni rabbihim min kulli amrin
